content.rendered:
This year's summit promises to be bigger and better than ever before, with industry leaders, researchers, and experts coming together to share their knowledge and insights about the latest trends and technologies in the field. From cutting-edge research to practical applications, this event has something for everyone.

BOOK your passes for MLDS 2025

But with so much interest in the field, tickets are selling out fast! We encourage you to book your passes at the earliest to avoid disappointment. Not only will you secure your spot at the summit, but you'll also have access to exclusive pre-event content and networking opportunities.

So don’t delay – book your passes now and join us for an unforgettable experience at the MLDS 2025!

We have a hard stop at 1500 passes!

group discount available

3-5 passes: 10% discount

6-10 passes: 20% discount

10+ passes: 30% discount

What to expect

3 Tracks over 3 days –

  • Keynotes/ Tech talks (Hall 1)
  • Tech Talks/ workshops (Hall 2)
  • Paper Presentation (Hall 3)

Besides – Mentoring sessions, Hackathon, Awards, Exhibition, Live Coding, Competitions & a lot more

Grab your ticket for a unique experience of inspiration, meeting and networking with Top Developers in India

Book your tickets at the earliest. We have a hard stop at 1000 passes.

Note: Ticket Pricing to change at any time.

  • 1 Day Pass

  • Access to all in-person tracks & workshops
  • Access the recorded sessions later
  • Access to in-person networking with attendees & speakers
  • Conference Lunch for 1 Day
  • No Group Discount Available
  • ₹7000
Recommended

  • Full Access Passes

    All Access 3 Day Pass
  • Access to all in-person tracks & workshops
  • Access the recorded sessions later
  • Access to in-person networking with attendees & speakers
  • Conference Lunch for all 3 days
  • No Group Discount Available
  • ₹15000

India's Biggest GenAI Summit for developers

40 under 40 data scientists awards

40Under40 is an attempt towards recognizing the leading data scientists in India who have successfully transformed data into meaningful insights.

2025 nominations are OPEN.

More Details
Got an opportunity to attend the Machine Learning Developer Summit 2023 at Bengaluru last week. Thanks to Viasat for the encouragement. It was a long and engaging couple of days where we were part of some interesting tech sessions and workshops. We also managed to meet, connect and hear from some of the best from the industry and were able to get a peek into the upcoming trends and techniques.

Arun Kumar L

Viasat

Last week, our team had a great time at #MLDS2023, India’s No.1 Conference Exclusively for ML Practitioners Ecosystem. It was encouraging to learn the focus on high-quality data is on the rise to create safer, more responsible, and ethical AI solutions.

iMerit Technology

Had a wonderful opportunity to present a paper at #mlds2023 and meet some great brains from Data Science community. It was great meeting #srk Sudalai Rajkumar – SRK at the conference! Kudos to #mlds2023 for a very well planned Data Science conference!!!

Prashik Waghamare

IQVIA

It was an incredible experience. Not only did I get to hear from some of the top minds in the industry, but I also got a sense of where the field is heading. The future of machine learning is incredibly exciting and I am grateful to have had the opportunity to learn from some of the best in the business. I am already looking forward to next year’s summit!

Sonam Rao

Koch Business Solutions India

call for papers

MLDS will include additional programs for technical paper presentations.

The submissions for 2025 are open.

More Details

Generative AI has the potential to change the world in ways that we can’t even imagine.

~Bill Gates
